results.name: Alice♥Parade ~Futari no Alice to Fushigi no Otome-tachi~
Rune's Pharmacy ~The Druggist of Tiara Isle~

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 4000 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 6600 or ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

results.name: The Sacrificial Girl of the Fantasy 3 Kingdoms

requirements_en.minimum:

  • Processor: PC with 2.0GHz Intel® Pentium® 4 equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution

  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 10
  • Processor: PC with 2.0GHz Intel® Pentium®4 equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
